WorkItem.ClosedComment: We don't plan to support this. If you have old items that can't use new gems just mark them with blue diamond using the old gems.
WorkItem.Description: How is the gear list showing cata gear with pandaria gems in it?  New gems require 417, and cannot be socketed into old gear.... this really is screwing with the list of possibilities for upgrade.  Also, are all the crafted and quest reward items not added?  There are many that aren't in my list that i know can be acquired/created.  Thank you

Comments.Message: Rawr is not generally intended for use with older gear, thus we have not included functionality to filter out gems at lower levels.  Most modules don't really support use below the area of the level cap (not intended for lvl 85s who are not leveling towards 90), and characters even characters that are level 85 will replace most of their Cata gear before even hitting 86 with Panda greens.
